data.name: Drafting Towers
data.detailed_description:
You're the pharaoh, your goal is to defend yourself against the alien invasion.
They may have built the pyramids, that was a long time ago, they are yours now!

BUILD YOUR DEFENSES


Various towers and temples are available to help you defeat the alien invaders.
Each game you will acquire different buildings and have a different strategy.

RELOAD YOUR BUILDINGS


Tower defense games often suffer from being passive on the player's end, constructing the tower and just watching the waves crash onto them.

In Drafting Towers, the towers have limited ammo so keep an eye on that and make sure to reload at the right time

DRAFT CARDS


Every once in a while, you will be able to draft a new card. The choice is different each game, adapt your strategy and don't let any invader in.


  • 100 cards
  • 25 buildings
  • 20 difficulties to climb
  • Hundreds hours of gameplay

data.short_description: A dynamic tower defense/deck-building game with roguelite mechanics! Build towers, protect your pyramids, and create your own strategy. Drafting towers is an addictive real time strategy game.
